Suggested readings relevant to the workshop

Museums and cradles of diversity are geographically coincident for narrowly distributed Neotropical snakes. Ecography 43, 328-339.

Li, X.Q., Xiang, X.G., Jabbour, F., Hagen, O., Ortiz, R.D.C., Soltis, P.S., Soltis, D.E. and Wang, W., 2022. Biotic colonization of subtropical East Asian caves through time. Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences 119, e2207199119.
